tasks.label: module-path-resolver
args: import sys; from pathlib import Path; file_path = '${file}'; workspace = '${workspaceFolder}'; rel_path = Path(file_path).relative_to(Path(workspace)); module_path = str(rel_path).replace('\\', '.').replace('/', '.').replace('.py', ''); print(f'Module Path Resolver:'); print(f'Current file: {file_path}'); print(f'Module path: {module_path}'); print(f'PYTHONPATH: src + local_packages'); print(f'Ready to run with enhanced path resolution'); sys.exit(0)
